author: amartelli
body:
This PR is simply to update the configuration to assign time to the HGC hits consistently to what used for the TDR studies: 
- enable the time for hits above 12fC
- introduce smearing inputs, constant and noise terms of 5ns and 20ps respectively (values are given already squared)
- resolution of the TDC used for time-of-arrival at about 24ps
- also increase the offset of the time stamp, to avoid underflow in the digitization for low S/N hits when the time can get a smearing up to 5ns. As before, this has to be corrected back at the analysis level.
title: update parameters for HGC timing to TDR inputs
